content.text: I love to experiment with different colors and styles, and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself through my clothing. What about you?
I'm not that into fashion, but I like to watch makeup tutorials in my spare time.
Really? That's so interesting. I like to watch them too! What are your favorite makeup artists?
I really like NikkieTutorials and James Charles. What about you?
I love NikkieTutorials too! I also like Huda Beauty and Manny MUA.
I've heard good things about Huda Beauty. I'll have to check them out.
I definitely recommend it. Their eyeshadow palettes are amazing.
Awesome. I'll have to try them out.
What do you do for work?
Oh, cool! I'm in school for computer science.
No way! That's awesome. What year are you in?
Cool. What do you want to do after you graduate?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still considering my options.
